This repository contains scripts to fill missing pixels in satellite data.  


## VGPM method

http://orca.science.oregonstate.edu/gap_fill.php



## DINEOF

`metR::ImputeEOF()`  
NOTE: ImputeEOF does not replace existing values, only fills missing values  

http://modb.oce.ulg.ac.be/mediawiki/index.php/DINEOF  

[Hilborn A, Costa M. Applications of DINEOF to Satellite-Derived Chlorophyll-a from a Productive Coastal Region. Remote Sensing. 2018; 10(9):1449. https://doi.org/10.3390/rs10091449](https://www.mdpi.com/2072-4292/10/9/1449)
